decideForInvestment(uint256,bool).details: This function is called by governance to approve or reject a investment request.

params.decision: The decision of the governance. [true -> approved] [false -> rejected]

executeLotteryRun(uint256).details: This function is called by any investor interested in a project to run part of the lottery.requires Started state and available tickets

getInvestmentMetadata(uint256).details: This helper function provides a single point for querying the Investment metadatareturns Investment Details, Investment Status, Investment Seeker Address and Repayment Batch Type

getRequestingInterestStatus(uint256).details: Returns true if investors have shown interest for equal or more than the total tickets.

params.investmentId: The id of the investment type to be checked.

params.baseAmountForEachPartition_: The base amount for each partition

initializeInvestment(address,uint256,uin.details: This function is called by the owner to initialize the investment type.

params.blocksLockedForReputation_: The amount of blocks needed for a ticket to be locked,        so as investor to get 1 rALBT for locking it.
params.rAlbtPerLotteryNumber_: The amount of rALBT needed to allocate one lucky number.
params.reputationalAlbt: The address of the rALBT contract.
params.totalTicketsPerRun_: The amount of tickets that will be provided from each run of the lottery.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestInvestment(address,uint256,uint25.details: This function is used for projects to request investment in exchange for project tokens.require valid amount

params.amountOfInvestmentTokens: The amount of investment tokens to be purchased.
params.extraInfo: The ipfs hash where more specific details for investment request are stored.
params.investmentToken: The token that will be purchased by investors.
params.totalAmountRequested_: The total amount requested so as all investment tokens to be sold.

showInterestForInvestment(uint256,uint25.details: This function is called by the investors who are interested to invest in a specific project.require Approval state and valid partition

params.amountOfPartitions: The amount of partitions this specific investor wanna invest in.

startLotteryPhase(uint256).details: This function is called by governance to start the lottery phase for an investment.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawAmountProvidedForNonWonTickets(u.details: This function is called by an investor to withdraw lending tokens provided for non-won tickets.

withdrawInvestmentTickets(uint256,uint25.details: This function is called by an investor to withdraw his tickets.require Settled state and enough tickets won

params.ticketsToLock: The amount of won tickets to be locked, so as to get more rALBT.
params.ticketsToWithdraw: The amount of won tickets to be withdrawn instantly.

withdrawLockedInvestmentTickets(uint256,.details: This function is called by an investor to withdraw his locked tickets.requires Settled state and available tickets.

params.ticketsToWithdraw: The amount of locked tickets to be withdrawn.
